statements: SELECT * FROM tourist_dietary_preferences WHERE tourist_id = 1
SELECT destination, dietary_preferences FROM tourist_dietary_preferences WHERE destination = 'Paris'
SELECT tourist_id, destination FROM tourist_dietary_preferences WHERE dietary_restrictions->>'allergies' = 'peanuts'
SELECT * FROM tourist_dietary_preferences ORDER BY destination DESC
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_count FROM tourist_dietary_preferences
SELECT * FROM tourist_dietary_preferences WHERE tourist_id = 1;
SELECT tourist_id, destination FROM tourist_dietary_preferences WHERE destination = 'Paris';
SELECT tourist_id, dietary_preferences->>'food_type' AS food_type FROM tourist_dietary_preferences WHERE dietary_preferences->>'food_type' = 'Vegetarian';
SELECT tourist_id, destination, dietary_restrictions FROM tourist_dietary_preferences WHERE dietary_restrictions->>'allergen' = 'Gluten';
SELECT tourist_id, destination FROM tourist_dietary_preferences WHERE dietary_restrictions->>'allergen' = 'Peanuts' ORDER BY destination DESC;
SELECT * FROM dietary_preferences;
SELECT tourist_id, destination_name, dietary_preference FROM dietary_preferences WHERE destination_name = 'New York';
SELECT destination_name, dietary_preference FROM dietary_preferences ORDER BY destination_name DESC;
SELECT tourist_id, restriction_reason FROM dietary_restrictions WHERE restriction_reason = 'allergy';
SELECT tourist_id, restriction_description FROM dietary_restrictions ORDER BY tourist_id ASC;
SELECT * FROM dietary_preferences WHERE destination_name = 'Paris';
SELECT tourist_id, dietary_preference FROM dietary_preferences WHERE dietary_preference = 'Vegetarian' ORDER BY tourist_id DESC;
SELECT destination_name, COUNT(*) AS tourist_count FROM dietary_preferences GROUP BY destination_name HAVING COUNT(*) > 1;
SELECT * FROM dietary_restrictions WHERE restriction_reason LIKE '%allergy%' AND restriction_description LIKE '%peanut%';

SELECT tourist_id, destination_name, dietary_preference FROM dietary_preferences WHERE destination_name = 'London' UNION ALL SELECT tourist_id, NULL, dietary_preference FROM dietary_preferences WHERE destination_name = 'Paris';
SELECT * FROM dietary_preferences;
SELECT tourist_id, destination_id, dietary_preference FROM dietary_preferences ORDER BY destination_id DESC;
SELECT destination_name, country FROM destinations WHERE country = 'France';
SELECT tourist_id, restriction_id, restriction_description FROM dietary_restrictions WHERE tourist_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM dietary_preferences WHERE destination_id IN (1, 2, 3);
SELECT * FROM destinations;
SELECT destination_name, country FROM destinations WHERE region='Europe';
SELECT tourist_id, destination_id FROM dietary_preferences ORDER BY destination_id DESC;
SELECT tourist_id, restriction_description FROM dietary_restrictions WHERE tourist_id=123;
SELECT destination_name, country, region FROM destinations WHERE country='Italy' AND region='Mediterranean';
SELECT * FROM Tourists;
SELECT name, nationality FROM Tourists WHERE age > 30;
SELECT destination_id, location, climate FROM Destinations ORDER BY location DESC;
SELECT tourist_id, name, dietary_preference FROM Tourists WHERE dietary_preference = 'Vegetarian';
SELECT review_id, rating, comments FROM Reviews WHERE rating >= 4;
SELECT * FROM Tourists WHERE nationality = 'USA';
SELECT name, age, nationality FROM Tourists WHERE age > 30 ORDER BY age DESC;
SELECT location, country, climate FROM Destinations WHERE country = 'Italy' AND region = 'Mediterranean';

SELECT r.rating, r.comments, t.name, d.location FROM Reviews r JOIN Tourists t ON r.tourist_id = t.tourist_id JOIN Destinations d ON r.destination_id = d.destination_id WHERE r.rating >= 4 ORDER BY r.rating DESC;
SELECT t.name, r.restriction_type, r.description FROM Restrictions r JOIN Tourists t ON r.tourist_id = t.tourist_id WHERE r.restriction_type = 'Medical' ORDER BY t.name;
SELECT * FROM tourists;
SELECT tourist_name, age, nationality FROM tourists;
SELECT tourist_name, dietary_preference FROM tourists WHERE age > 40;
SELECT destination_name, country FROM destinations WHERE region = 'Europe';
SELECT destination_name, country, region FROM destinations ORDER BY destination_name DESC;
SELECT tourist_name, age, nationality FROM tourists WHERE age > 30;
SELECT tourist_name, dietary_preference FROM tourists WHERE dietary_restriction IS NULL;
SELECT destination_name, country, region FROM destinations ORDER BY country ASC, region DESC;
SELECT tourist_name, nationality, preference_name FROM tourists JOIN preferences ON tourists.tourist_id = preferences.preference_id;

SELECT tourist_name, dietary_preference, restriction_name FROM tourists JOIN tourist_restriction_mapping ON tourists.tourist_id = tourist_restriction_mapping.tourist_id JOIN restrictions ON tourist_restriction_mapping.restriction_id = restrictions.restriction_id;
